content:
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky has negotiated Ukraine's defense capability with Prime Minister of Greece Kiriakos Kharotakis.

The head of statetoldIn your evening address.

“Of course, our defense, our opportunities in active actions and protection, was the main issue in negotiations with Greece Prime Minister of Greece. Air defense. Unconditional priority. As in negotiations with other partners. Air defense systems and opportunities to produce weapons for protection in the world, ”the message reads.

He stressed that weapons were needed here to save people's lives. And the solution is needed now - not once, but for people who can withstand terrorist attacks every day and night.

“Only last night and only Odessa was twenty" Shahaned. " This morning is another missile attack against the city. There are wounded, there are dead ... There is more protection, ”Volodymyr Zelenskyy added.

The President also discussed today with Greece Prime Minister, Michotakis, how here in the south of Ukraine, our people can be strengthened.

As reported by the Armyinform, President with Greece Prime MinisterVisitedOdessa Transfiguration Cathedral, destroyed by Russia.
title: "Weapons and Air Defense - Unconditional Priority": The President told about negotiations with Greece Prime Minister
